item.title: InsightIDR (US3, AP, AU) - Scheduled maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Scheduled Maintenance Summary: InsightIDR is undergoing scheduled maintenance, where brief interruptions in the collector and event source functionality may occur, along with slight delays in events sent from collectors.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 13, 12:30 - 14:30 UTC

Mar 12, 13:11 UTC
Scheduled - InsightIDR is undergoing scheduled maintenance. During this time, you may experience brief interruptions in the collector and event source functionality in the front end, and slight delays in events sent from collectors.

item.title: InsightIDR (EU, CA, US2, US1) - Scheduled maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Maintenance for InsightIDR

InsightIDR is undergoing scheduled maintenance to optimize our systems and performance. During this time, you may experience brief interruptions or delays in event processing, user interface, and APIs. No data loss will occur.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 12, 21:30 - 23:30 UTC

Mar 7, 18:22 UTC
Scheduled - InsightIDR is undergoing scheduled maintenance to optimize our systems and performance. During this time, you may experience brief interruptions or delays in event processing, user interface, and APIs. No data loss will occur.

item.title: Insight Agent (US1) - Scheduled Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Scheduled Maintenance in US1 Region

Insight Agent Platform services in the US1 region will undergo scheduled maintenance, causing potential short delays in various operations.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 14, 02:00 - 03:00 UTC

Mar 7, 03:02 UTC
Scheduled - We will be undergoing a scheduled maintenance of one of the Insight Agent Platform services in the US1 region. You may experience short delays in applying Insight Agent configurations, Agent log retrieval, downloading the Agent installer, uploading files and viewing some Agent settings.

item.title: Insight Platform Login degradation
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Platform Outage

Customers are unable to load the Rapid7 Insights Platform. Incident has been identified and engineering team is working on applying the necessary fixes.

Feb 29, 23:46 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 29, 23:24 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and our Engineering team is working on applying the necessary fixes

Feb 29, 23:14 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating reports of customers not being able to load the Rapid7 Insights Platform.

item.title: InsightAppSec - CA Region - Scheduled maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Feb 15, 12:14 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 15, 09:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 5, 09:37 UTC
Scheduled - Maintenance for InsightAppSec is scheduled at 9am UTC Thursday, February 15th. Access to the product will be significantly disrupted during these hours. Additionally there will be a system wide blackout in place, this will pause all running scans and prevent new or scheduled scans from running. We expect the maintenance will be completed by 1pm UTC on Thursday, February 15th.

item.title: Single Sign On degradation
item.content:encoded:
Feb 12, 09:25 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 9, 19:19 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 8, 14:55 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified. Customers creating new SSO integrations on the platform are affected
